name: Learn Spanish VR
description:
Learn Spanish in VR!

This experience has been developed by Ricardo and Monica Alonso to enable VR users to immerse themselves in a VR environment full with objects that you can grab and learn about each object. The rest is up to your imagination. this experience was made specially for people with speech problems. it seem to be a good tool for them to recover.

this experience is short, but it will get improved with the time in future updates, but to do that we need your support. if you buy this game you are supporting such effort.
